name: Finnish trade union representation to the EU
membership: FinUnions represents the trade union confederations in Finland. The total membership of their affiliated unions is 1.7 million.
memberOrga: FinUnions is the Brussels representation of SAK, STTK and YTN.
goal:
FinUnions represents Finnish trade union confederations (SAK, STTK and YTN) in Brussels.

For further information on the confederations and their objectives:

SAK: www.sak.fi
STTK: www.sttk.fi
YTN: www.ytn.fi
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: FinUnions follows all EU policies that are relevant to the interests of the members of our affiliated trade unions, and of employees more generally. Our particular focus is on social, labour and economic policies. FinUnions works on behalf of its member federations to ensure that the voice of workers in Finland is heard in European policy-making.
